content: toksknits lola hat sizes s m head circumference 51-54 56-59 cm / 20-21 22-23¼ inches suggested needles 3 5mm us4 16 inches/40cm circular needle and 3 5mm us4 double-pointed needles or suitable needle size to get gauge gauge 20 stitches x 24 row in 2x2 rib k2 p2 on 3 5mm us4 needles = 10x 10 cm or 4x4 inches yarn 100-150 150 g of drops lima 50g = 100m or 109yds held together with 25 25 g of knitting for olive soft silk mohair 25g = 225m or 246yds abbreviations k - knit p - purl bor - beginning of round sm - slip marker ssk - slip slip knit slip 2 stitches knitwise insert the left needle into both stitches through the front and knit both stitches through the back loop k2tog - knit 2 stitches together st s stitch es round - round the lola hat is a simple classic beanie knit in 2x2 rib with a double folded brim and easy simple decreases shape the top of the hat pattern cast on 96 112 sts with 3 5mm us4 40 cm /16 inches circular needle using a long tail cast-on or your preferred cast-on join the work in the round and place a marker for the beginning of round work in the round in 2x2 rib k2 p2 until the hat measures 28 29 cm / 11 11½ inches from the cast-on edge now it s time to shape the top of the hat with decreases change to 3 5mm us4 double pointed needles or the magic loop method when necessary move the bor marker 1 st over so that your first stitch of the round is now the second knit stitch of the pair place 3 more markers with 24 28 sts between each marker there should be a total of 4 markers including the bor marker the decreases are worked every other round as round 1 *ssk work sts in rib as the sts appear to 2 sts before marker k2tog* work from * to * a total of 4 times 8 sts decreased round 2 work in rib as sts appear work rounds 1-2 a total of 7 9 times you should have 40 sts left on the needles now work round 1 another 3 times 16 sts left on the needle break the yarn and thread the end through the remaining sts on the needles to secure it pull to close the top of the hat but not too tight weave in the ends on the inside wash and block the hat to wear fold the brim twice to your desired length toksknits © 2025 this pattern is for private use only this pattern may not be sold copied or redistributed sale of items made from this pattern is prohibited use the hashtag #lolahat on instagram http //www toksknits com/ // instagram @toksknits
